chapter.title: Calling Plugins
chapter.para: This chapter describes the structure of SOAP calls to CartoWeb server's method in order to obtain cartographic data. Global WSDL code can be found in file CARTOWEB_HOME/server/cartoserver.wsdl WSDL code specific to plugins are located in PLUGIN_HOME/common/plugin_name.wsdl.inc Interesting parts from these files are copied in the following sections. Complete WSDL code dynamically generated for a mapId is accessible at the URL CARTOWEB_URL/cartoserver.wsdl.php?mapId=project_name.mapfile_name TODO: Explain when getMapInfo/getMap is called
